mapper.select: select boardno, userid, productno, btitle, uindex, bdate, bcontent, bcount, board_origin, board_re from productqnas order by boardno desc
mapper.insert: insert into boardno, userid, productno, btitle, uindex, bdate, bcontent, bcount, board_origin, board_re values (seq_boardno.nextval, #{userid}, #{productno}, #{btitle}, #{uindex}, sysdate, #{bcontent}, #{bcount}, #{board_origin}, #{board_re})
